original_title: Noam Chomsky - Crisis And Hope: Theirs And Ours
overview: On June 12, 2009, Noam Chomsky gave a historic address at the Riverside Church in New York City. More than 2,000 people attended this historic address, captured here in which Chomsky offered a powerful analysis of the current economic crisis and its structural roots. The DVD also features and Introduction by Amy Goodman and a one on one interview with Noam Chomsky.
title: Noam Chomsky - Crisis And Hope: Theirs And Ours
